newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Hilton Int'l to operate new hotel in Israel.
newsitem.headline: Hilton Int'l to operate new hotel in Israel.

text.p: Hilton International will operate a 262-room, $36 million hotel in Beersheba, the largest city in southern Israel, the company said on Monday.
The hotel is scheduled to open in December this year. The Beersheba agreement was signed on Sunday between Hilton International and Elad Hotels Corporation Ltd, developers of the hotel.

Hilton International recently announced that it would manage a resort village on the Dead Sea and a convention hotel in the port city of Haifa. The company also operates the 600-room Tel Aviv Hilton and plans to open a Jerusalem Hilton next year.
"Within the next couple of years Hilton International will increase the number of hotel rooms in Israel from 600 to 1800," said Oded Lifschitz, Hilton International director for Israel.
Hilton International, a subsidiary of Ladbroke Plc, operates more than 160 hotels in almost 50 countries.
